t: How to update the brightness settings on my Amazon Kindle Paperwhite - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 3): Touch the top of your screen. You should see a horizontal menu appear, with choices represented by icon. Touch the one that looks like a sun. You should then see a slider, which you can slide one way to dim the screen and the other way to brighten it. There may be other ways to d...
